planets.name: Mercury
planets.god: Mercury (Roman) - god of merchants, travelers and messages
planets.funFact: Mercury has no moons and it's the smallest planet in the solar system

planets.name: Venus
planets.god: Venus (Roman) - goddess of love and beauty
planets.funFact: Venus rotates in the opposite direction to most planets

planets.name: Earth
planets.god: Gaia (Greek) - goddess of earth or land and shows that she was the human version of the earth
planets.funFact: Earth has a powerful magnetic field

planets.name: Mars
planets.god: Mars (Roman) - god of war and also an agricultural guardian
planets.funFact: Mars is home to the tallest mountain in the solar system

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.god: Jupiter (Roman) - god of the sky and thunder, and king of the gods
planets.funFact: Jupiter has the shortest day of all the planets

planets.name: Saturn
planets.god: Saturn (Roman) - god of the Capitol, time, wealth, agriculture, and liberation
planets.funFact: Saturn was known to the ancients, including the Babylonians and Far Eastern observers

planets.name: Uranus
planets.god: Uranus (Greek) - god of the Sky and The Heavens
planets.funFact: Uranus turns on its axis once every 17 hours, 14 minutes

planets.name: Neptune
planets.funFact: A year on Neptune lasts 165 Earth years
